entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having a conversation with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is trying to convince him to come back to Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, who is concerned about the possibility of Hogwarts closing.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A magical school that Harry and his friends attend.

entities.name: du rsleys
entities.description: Harry's Muggle relatives, who he is forced to live with.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as having a plan for Harry.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: A location where Harry's parents are buried.

relationships.description: Harry has a connection to Hogwarts as he is a student there.
Ron is friends with Harry and tries to convince him to come back to Hogwarts.
Hermione has a connection to Hogwarts as she is a student there.
Harry lives with the Dursleys, his Muggle relatives.
Dumbledore has a plan for Harry.
Godric's Hollow is a significant location to Harry as his parents are buried there.
